entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: The main character of the story, mentioned as shouting at Uncle Vernon through the locked door of his cupboard.

entities.name: uncle vernon
entities.description: Harry's uncle, complained to Aunt Petunia about various things.

entities.name: aunt petunia
entities.description: Uncle Vernon's wife, listened to his complaints while driving.

entities.name: dudley
entities.description: Harry's cousin, mentioned as someone Harry had to be with on the day.

entities.name: piers
entities.description: Another person Harry had to spend the day with.

entities.name: mrs figg
entities.description: A neighbor of Harry's, mentioned as having a cabbage-smelling living-room.

entities.name: council
entities.description: An organization that Uncle Vernon complained about.

relationships.description: Uncle Vernon complained to Aunt Petunia about Harry.
Harry was one of Uncle Vernon's favorite subjects to complain about.
Uncle Vernon complained to Aunt Petunia while driving.
Harry had a dream about a motorbike that was flying.
